thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15
text:
July 6 For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** MONDAY, JULY 6
MEXICO CITY - Mexico Finance Minister Luis Videgaray and OECD Secretary General Angel Gurria will co-host a "Global Dialogue on the Future of Productivity: Towards an OECD Productivity Network" (to July 7). MOSCOW - Meeting of BRICS Contact Group on economic and trade issues. KAZAN, Russia - BRICS Ministers of Youth Affairs meeting (to July 7). TUESDAY, JULY 7 MOSCOW - BRICS finance ministers and central bank governors' meeting and meeting of the board of governors of the BRICS New Development Bank. MOSCOW - Meeting of the BRICS finance and trade ministers. BUDAPEST - Hungarian National Bank non-rate-setting meeting. ABUJA - Central bank of Kenya interest rate decision meeting. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to July 8). RABAT - Central bank of Morocco holds monetary and financial committee meeting. WEDNESDAY, JULY 8 UFA, Russia - SCO and BRICS financial forum. UFA, Russia - BRICS business council meeting. UFA, Russia - Annual meeting of heads of banks of the BRICS Interbank Cooperation Mechanism. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland rate decision, followed by Central Bank Governor Marek Belka's news conference - 1400 GMT. BUDAPEST - Central Bank of Hungary to publish minutes of June policy meeting - 1200 GMT. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia holds executive board meeting - 2200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatian National Bank holds council meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia holds monetary policy committee meeting (to July 09).
THURSDAY, JULY 9
UFA, Russia - BRICS Trade Union forum. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision, followed by policy statement - 1000 GMT. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds monetary policy committee meeting 0100 GMT. LIMA - Central bank of Peru interest rate decision - 2300 GMT.
TUESDAY, JULY 14
JAKARTA - Indonesia central bank board of governors meeting. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile interest rate decision - 2100 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, JULY 15
ACCRA - Bank of Ghana interest rate decision - 1130 GMT.
